doc.title: Only When It Snows
doc.plot: While at a party with her cousin and a group of friends, Orion runs into former love interest, Ricky. Having unwittingly accepted a drink that has been drugged by Ricky, her perception of reality begins to blur as she fades in and out of consciousness. In her own bed, Orion awakes to Ricky raping her. Fearful that no one else would believe her, she calls on her boyfriend Marcus only to be rejected, alone with her pain. The fear and confusion of reality triggers memories of a tragedy from her childhood forcing Orion to make a life-changing decision.
